blogPost.excerpt: Cocktail is a general purpose utility for macOS that lets you clean, repair and optimize your Mac. It is a powerful digital toolset that helps hundreds of thousands of Mac users around the world get the most out of their computers every day.
blogPost.body: Cocktail is a general purpose utility for macOS that lets you clean, repair and optimize your Mac. It is a powerful digital toolset that helps hundreds of thousands of Mac users around the world get the most out of their computers every day.
blogPost.title: Cocktail - Clean, repair and optimize your Mac 🍸
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 鸡尾酒是MacOS的一个通用实用程序，可以让你清洁、修复和优化你的Mac。这是一个强大的数字工具包，可以帮助世界各地的数十万Mac用户每天最大限度地利用他们的计算机。
雞尾酒是MacOS的一個通用實用程序，可以讓你清潔、修復和優化你的Mac。這是一個強大的數字工具包，可以幫助世界各地的數十萬Mac用戶每天最大限度地利用他們的計算機。
